de:

en:
A few years ago, the SENSEFUL festival in Senegal made its mark on people's minds. Not a week goes by without people asking for it. So here's its little brother, a one-day event: ğ—¦ğ—˜ğ—¡ğ—¦ğ—˜ğ—™ğ—¨ğ—Ÿ ğ—¢ğ—¡ğ—˜ ğ—¦ğ—›ğ—¢ğ—§
A day to learn or perfect your kizomba and bachata.
Classes for all levels and an evening with 2 rooms!

Bachata programme
O SAFARI Room 
â–ªï¸14h to 3pm - Bj Michel and Omar: emblematic teachers from Icona Latina in Auxerre. Modern bachata for beginners.
â–ªï¸15h05 to 4.05pm - Xavier Bachio: the benchmark for bachata in Senon. Progressive modern bachata class.
â–ªï¸16h10 to 17h10 - Emi and Abel: well-known and recognised in the Troyes area. Sensual fusion bachata class.
â–ªï¸17h15 to 6.15pm - Guins and Camila Molinaro: dance enthusiasts and experts. Progressive modern/sensual bachata class
â–ªï¸18h20 at 7.20pm - Guins and Camila for a second intermediate-level bachata mixstyle class.


Kizomba programme
BOWLING ROOM 
â–ªï¸14h at 3pm - Steven, the leading kizomba teacher at Icona Latina and more widely in Auxerre, accompanied by Anne-So, an experienced dancer. A progressive beginners' class to learn or review the basic steps, connection, guidance and precision.
â–ªï¸15h05 at 4.05pm - Pierre Barraud: the best in Loiret. A progressive Kizomba class open to all, with a hip hop feel.
â–ªï¸16h10 to 5.10pm - Antoine ZK De GalactiKiz: the Trojan stalwart. Intermediate footwork class
â–ªï¸17h15 to 6.15pm - Amandine Varela and Horace: organisers and specialists in urban kiz. Beginners' class: attitude and basic steps for dancing kizomba.
â–ªï¸18h20 at 7.20pm - Amandine Varela and Horace for an advanced urban kiz class focusing on technical skills.

EVENINGS
9pm to 3am
MB DJkizomba
Francky Tha Sick

 Catering point
O SAFARI : Atmosphere and cuisine with African flavours. 
Book your table: 06 40 27 16 27
